content: Hi everyone, Conexus is trying to gauge interest in a research program to connect probabilistic programming languages such as https://www.gen.dev to compositional ways to model dynamical systems, such as https://math.ucr.edu/home/baez/stock-flow/ - we have some funding available for e.g. students to work part time but if there is a lot of interest - and we hope there is - we'll find more! Interested folks can write to me here or at ryan@conexus.com
